name: Equipment Ledger
query:
select
    IFNULL(eqprob.posting_date, eqprob.modified) as posting_date,
    eq.name as name,
    eq.status as eq_status,
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data/Item:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data/Location:150",
    doctype.name as "DocType:Data/DocType:150",
    eqprob.status as "Status:Select:150",
    eqprob.name as "Reference:Dynamic Link/doc_type:150"

from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabProblem Report` eqprob,`tabDocType` doctype,`tabRFID Trace` rf
where
    eq.name = eqprob.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s and
    doctype.name = 'Problem Report'

union
select
    IFNULL(eqmaint.posting_date, eqmaint.modified) as posting_date,
    eq.name as name,
    eq.status as eq_status,
    eq.item_code as item_code,
    eq.location as location,
    'Equipment Maintenance' as reference_type,
    eqmaint.status as status,
    eqmaint.name as reference

from 
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabEquipment Maintenance` eqmaint
where
    eq.name = eqmaint.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s
union
select
    IFNULL(eqlog.posting_date, eqlog.modified) as posting_date,
    eq.name as name,
    eq.status as eq_status,
    eq.item_code as item_code,
    eq.location as location,
    'Equipment Log' as "Reference Type:Data:150",
    eqlog.status as status,
    eqlog.name as "Reference:Link/Equipment Log:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabEquipment Log` eqlog
where
    eq.name = eqlog.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s

union
select
    IFNULL(rf.posting_date, rf.modified) as posting_date,
    eq.name as name,
    eq.status as eq_status,
    eq.item_code as item_code,
    eq.location as location,
    'RFID Trace' as "Reference Type:Data:150",
    null as status,
    rf.name as "Reference:Link/RFID Trace:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabRFID Trace` rf
where
    eq.name = rf.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s

union
select
    IFNULL(mem.posting_date, mem.modified) as posting_date,
    eq.name as name,
    eq.status as eq_status,
    eq.item_code as item_code,
    eq.location as location,
    'Manual Equipment Movement' as "Reference Type:Data:150",
    mem.type as status,
    mem.name as "Reference:Link/RFID Trace:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabManual Equipment Movement` mem
where
    eq.name = mem.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s
    order by posting_date desc
